<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diverse Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=3699) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 42</row>

</column>

---

Your wandering studies mean you've heard rumors or theories about almost every topic... though admittedly, your sources aren't always the most reliable. You can take a –2 penalty to your check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) with [Esoteric Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) to Recall Knowledge about any topic, not just the usual topics available for Esoteric Lore. Additionally, when you succeed at your check to [Exploit a Vulnerability](/Actions.aspx?ID=1227), compare the result of your Esoteric Lore check to the DC to Recall Knowledge for that creature; if that number would be a success or a critical success, you gain information as if you had succeeded at the Recall Knowledge check.
name: Diverse Lore
